embeddedItem.name: Enhancement Paste: Quantum
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases Quantum DMG of all allies by <nobr>24%</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

"Half the effort, double the result."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

272600.name: Slime of Harmony
272600.lore:
A torus that seems to possess the power of the Harmony.
It only has one surface. No matter where you depart, you're destined to not reach your destination.
A tiny complaint would be that it is a bit sticky, as if it does not want to let you go.

"All are connected and the wind of blessing breathes across the lands!"
comeFrom: Stargazer Navalia: Entranced Ingenium: Obedient Dracolion or other enemies

356475.name: Gaseous liquid
356475.lore:
Is it fog, rain, or wind?
You can't tell if it's still in the container without lifting the lid.

"The answer my friend, is blowing in the gaseous liquid..."
"The answer is blowing in the gaseous liquid."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

787518.name: Quantum Ripples
787518.lore:
Ripples in the Sea of Quanta.
Although called "ripples," they are in fact the most basic form of energy fluctuation.

"Time, there's so much time."
"All the time there is."
comeFrom: Rivet Town: Imaginary Weavers or other enemies

988811.name: Recipe: Enhancement Paste: Quantum
988811.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
